topic.title: ZeroTalk sync Problems
topic.body:
the zerotalk isnt up-to-date on local device compared to my proxy (less threads, direct access to these 'hidden' threads just show partial comments)
and how does the users.json work if i insert zeroid cert at public proxy? multiuser is active but import of the priv-key isnt importing zeroid. am i  right that this key works after cert insert or just for everyone accessing the proxy?

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body:
/1KUR242vYb5BDAiLkfa321fXfsDr5vBj3i

it'll keep most dangerous sites out of your range, and ads should be gone too

3_1ED3Ho3kmzaKiECtyuqSjDpoE47rKuXeP.body: im fascinated of reactos but it needs much more devs

4_1ED3Ho3kmzaKiECtyuqSjDpoE47rKuXeP.body: the alt argument gaves an alternate text if image cant load, your code looks like youve tried to link directly with an img tag.

1_1EgHYvFHeuRQ4HSde9YTrjsGkSAW39U14b.body: ive tried to import zeronet-master to qpython but it fails on user rights to install libraries over pypi. there are other python apps ported for android, maybe someone can get it working

1_14mWrAYpbKKX33SrrSx36zybyNUxcZAbmk.body:
all sites on zeronet are opensourced cause the whole data got transfered on seeding. all files that arent included inside content.json , arent needed to get it working (except the owner will host itself, this could mean template will work decentral but not the whole service if owner is offline)
so feel free to look inside your data folder and discover some code

1_1QGWjfYfANXvVDaHaH8n5w86KWkKcjiAoE.body:

t> [nofish](#comment_94_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): There is a command line switch for this:   --homepage address    Web interface Homepage (default: 1EU1tbG9oC1A8jz2ouVwGZyQ5asrNsE4Vr)

thanks. zerohello cant be copied? ive downloaded source over github no sites were shown.

heathenman
contact for bphf and zero.pags.to proxy (&of course my other projects outside of zeronet)
btw: proxy is up-to-date , gnusocial on pags.to working again, yacy restarted (crashes very often) , bphf 131215 out now

no, its copy&paste update notification to all posted mailnames cause theoretical these users want a contact. btw i think the username suggestion in the @ form could lead to unwanted messages.
maybe otoman will look for external input methods to enable possibility of an automatic process & maillist support (multi recipients)

3_1MS7WkWAZUSohgV5uUF2Ze3kdbifi4J82L.body:
the spider needs an inbuild version of the wrapper_nonce and wrapper_key generation , this will build a one time access to the inner content. you can test this if you open the page source code and search for <!-- Site info --> section.
theres document.getElementById("inner-iframe").src = ">>copy this<<"
now paste in browser, add an >>&<< and add the key from wrapper_key = ">>here<<" behind. this opens the actual page without a frame , but if you reload or want a look inside source (which a spider would crawl) , youll get wrapper nonce error-> cause its the wrong key now.

2_1PaX4LQSsjsJvTNqfZbAApgmgzBJjrkRqZ.body:
> [switch](#comment_1_1PDeGMWW6badM8gzU6eApYMiFpJfXJNQXb): is it down? But how can something be down in a P2P NET? :O

no peers , page needs online authority or bad code ;)
looks cribbled from here too:
QmWFeo9dk11wJ4CqanHCFXCQQKt6wDbzEz6XSB5FpwYGYg
its an image ipfs hash, you can view it on
https://ipfs.pics/
https://ipfs.io/ipfs/
& maybe http://ipfs.nwps.ws/ [server having problems atm]
just insert hash behind.
